Function reference

DBI and dplyr

src_bigquery()
A BigQuery data source for dplyr.
dbConnect(<BigQueryDriver>)
BigQuery DBI driver

Low-level API

bq_dataset_create() bq_dataset_meta() bq_dataset_exists() bq_dataset_update() bq_dataset_delete() bq_dataset_tables()
BigQuery datasets
bq_job_meta() bq_job_status() bq_job_show_statistics() bq_job_wait()
BigQuery job: retrieve metadata
bq_project_datasets() bq_project_jobs()
BigQuery project methods
bq_table_create() bq_table_meta() bq_table_fields() bq_table_size() bq_table_nrow() bq_table_exists() bq_table_delete() bq_table_copy() bq_table_upload() bq_table_save() bq_table_load() bq_table_patch()
BigQuery tables
bq_auth()
Authorize bigrquery
bq_auth_configure() bq_oauth_client()
Edit and view auth configuration
bq_deauth()
Clear current token
bq_field() bq_fields() as_bq_field() as_bq_fields()
BigQuery field (and fields) class
bq_has_token()
Is there a token on hand?
bq_projects()
List available projects
bq_project_query() bq_dataset_query()
Submit query to BigQuery
bq_dataset() as_bq_dataset() bq_table() as_bq_table() bq_job() as_bq_job()
S3 classes for BigQuery datasets, tables and jobs
bq_table_download()
Download table data
bq_token()
Produce configured token
bq_user()
Get info on current user
